data.text: @CBCOttawa Honestly I was very united and happy with how well we had done with the pandemic as a country until yesterday.I am now done with the health and education sections of our province.Once you enact things that will greatly affect my kids health and safety you could not divide me more
@CBCOttawa its just revealed who the selfish scum bags are
@CBCOttawa It wasn’t the pandemic, it was the divisive rhetoric of politicians and media. Hope you’re proud of your accomplishments!
@CBCOttawa People are the Problem. I said this at the beginning. People will be the real issue in this Pandemic and I was Right. Not Enough People care. Too many are Selfish.
@CBCOttawa CBC leads the way in Canada to promote division. Look in the mirror journalists.

@CBCOttawa "The governments' COVID-19 policies have brought out the worst in people....." There, I fixed your title.

#DefundCBC

@CBCOttawa The CCP has enabled the pitting of citizens against each other pandering to those who have no respect for public heath for votes, prioritizing profit over ppl, and enabling and encouraging mallicious occupiers that wish to do harm to our democracy. Conservatives are the problem
